thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location!
thread.title_full: Perfect location! - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PeterMimi2525
title: Perfect location!
text:
Ibis London Euston St Pancras is perfect located for a London city trip, when you're traveling to London with the Eurostar, than you arrive nearly at the front door of the hotel. The underground station "Euston" is just next door,so in no time you're at the London hotspots!
The lobby of the hotel is spacious and modern. The staff is very friendly and helpfull. The rooms are " London sized", but the bed is very comfortable and the room is equiped with everything you need to feel welcome.
Breakfast is a full scale buffet from good quallity.
